entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
